title: Application for Certificate of Tax Exemption for Cooperatives

fields.label: RDO Filing Reference No/Document Locator
fields.summary: Enter the filing reference number.

fields.label: Date of Application
fields.summary: Enter the application date in MM/DD/YYYY format.

fields.label: Certificate of Tax Exemption
fields.summary: Mark Original or Renewal.

fields.label: Cooperative Identification Number
fields.summary: Enter the cooperative identification number.

fields.label: Date of CDA Registration
fields.summary: Enter the CDA registration date.

fields.label: Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN)
fields.summary: Enter the TIN in the specified format.

fields.label: RDO Code
fields.summary: Enter the RDO code.

fields.label: Registered Name
fields.summary: Enter the registered name in CAPITAL LETTERS.

fields.label: Registered Address
fields.summary: Indicate the complete registered address.

fields.label: Contact Number
fields.summary: Enter the landline or cellphone number.

fields.label: Email Address
fields.summary: Enter the email address.

fields.label: Type of Cooperative
fields.summary: Specify the type of cooperative.

fields.label: Main Line of Business
fields.summary: Enter the main line of business.

fields.label: Extent of Transaction
fields.summary: Mark Members Only or Both Members and Non-Members.

fields.label: Accumulated Reserve and Undivided Net Savings
fields.summary: Indicate the amount for accumulated reserve.

fields.label: Share Capital Contribution
fields.summary: Select P 15,000 or Less per Member or More Than P 15,000 per Member.

fields.label: Certificate of Good Standing
fields.summary: Enter the date issued by CDA.

fields.label: Return of Net Income
fields.summary: Confirm that at least 25% of net income is returned to members.

fields.label: Update of BIR Registration
fields.summary: Confirm application for BIR registration update.

fields.label: Similar Application
fields.summary: Confirm no similar application has been filed.

fields.label: Pending Matters
fields.summary: Confirm no pending matters with BIR or other agencies.

fields.label: Declaration
fields.summary: Declare the truthfulness of the application.

fields.label: Signature over Printed Name
fields.summary: Provide signature and printed name of authorized person.

fields.label: Stamp of Receiving Office and Date of Receipt
fields.summary: Office use only; leave blank.
